languages.text: "Ваши действия также вызывают вопросы, Лорд-инквизитор. Пусть вы и вольны творить суд и расправу над держателями священного Патента, здесь, у неизведанных звезд, палачом для погрязшего в ереси Инквизитора может стать и сам{mf||а} Вольный Торговец". {n}Уверенный ясный взгляд обращается к Калькасару.{/n} "Я вижу... краски вашей души запятнаны оттенками цвета засохшей крови".

"Your actions have been questionable too, Lord Inquisitor. You may be within your rights to judge and punish bearers of the sacred Warrant, but here, among the uncharted stars, a Rogue Trader may easily find themselves executing an Inquisitor who is steeped in heresy." {n}Cassia's clear and confident gaze turns to Calcazar.{/n} "I see the canvas of your soul... and it is tainted with the gory hues of dried blood."
languages.original_text: "Ваши действия также вызывают вопросы, Лорд-инквизитор. Пусть вы и вольны творить суд и расправу над держателями священного Патента, здесь, у неизведанных звезд, палачом для погрязшего в ереси Инквизитора может стать и сам{mf||а} Вольный Торговец". {n}Уверенный ясный взгляд обращается к Калькасару.{/n} "Я вижу... краски вашей души запятнаны оттенками цвета засохшей крови".

traits.locale_text: "Your actions have been questionable too, Lord Inquisitor. You may be within your rights to judge and punish holders of holy Warrants, but here, among uncharted stars, a Rogue Trader may in turn execute an Inquisitor who is steeped in heresy." {n}Her clear and confident gaze turns to Calcazar.{/n} "I see... gory hues tainting the colours of your soul."

"Your actions have been questionable too, Lord Inquisitor. You may be within your rights to judge and punish holders of holy Warrants, but here, among uncharted stars, a Rogue Trader may in turn execute an Inquisitor who is steeped in heresy." {n}Her clear and confident gaze turns to Calcazar.{/n} "I see... gory hues tainting the colours of your soul."

"Your actions have been questionable too, Lord Inquisitor. You may be within your rights to judge and punish the holders of the holy Warrants, but here, among uncharted stars, a Rogue Trader may easily find themself executing an Inquisitor who is steeped in heresy." {n}Her clear and confident gaze turns to Calcazar.{/n} "I see... gory hues of dried blood tainting the colours of your soul."

"Your actions have been questionable too, Lord Inquisitor. You may be within your rights to judge and punish the holders of the holy Warrants, but here, among uncharted stars, a Rogue Trader may easily find themself executing an Inquisitor who is steeped in heresy." {n}Her clear and confident gaze turns to Calcazar.{/n} "I see... gory hues of dried blood tainting the colours of your soul."

You may be within your rights to judge and punish bearers of the sacred Warrant, but here, among the uncharted stars, a Rogue Trader may easily find themselves executing an Inquisitor who is steeped in heresy." {n}Her clear and confident gaze turns to Calcazar.{/n} "I see the canvas of your soul... and it is tainted with the gory hues of dried blood."

"Your actions have been questionable too, Lord Inquisitor. You may be within your rights to judge and punish bearers of the sacred Warrant, but here, among the uncharted stars, a Rogue Trader may easily find themselves executing an Inquisitor who is steeped in heresy." {n}Cassia's clear and confident gaze turns to Calcazar.{/n} "I see the canvas of your soul... and it is tainted with the gory hues of dried blood."

"Your actions have been questionable too, Lord Inquisitor. You may be within your rights to judge and punish bearers of the sacred Warrant, but here, among the uncharted stars, a Rogue Trader may easily find themselves executing an Inquisitor who is steeped in heresy." {n}Cassia's clear and confident gaze turns to Calcazar.{/n} "I see the canvas of your soul... and it is tainted with the gory hues of dried blood."

languages.text: «Sus actos también han sido cuestionables, Lord Inquisidor. Puede tener derecho a juzgar y castigar a los portadores de la sagrada Patente, pero aquí, entre estrellas desconocidas, un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente puede ejecutar sin problemas a un Inquisidor consumido por la herejía». {n}Cassia dirige su mirada despejada y llena de confianza hacia Calcazar.{/n} «Veo el lienzo de su alma... y está mancillada con los tonos cruentos de la sangre seca».
languages.original_text: "Your actions have been questionable too, Lord Inquisitor. You may be within your rights to judge and punish bearers of the sacred Warrant, but here, among the uncharted stars, a Rogue Trader may easily find themselves executing an Inquisitor who is steeped in heresy." {n}Cassia's clear and confident gaze turns to Calcazar.{/n} "I see the canvas of your soul... and it is tainted with the gory hues of dried blood."

traits.locale_text: «Sus acciones también son cuestionables, Lord Inquisidor. Está en su derecho de juzgar y castigar a los titulares de las sagradas Patentes, pero aquí entre las estrellas inexploradas un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente no tendría muchos problemas para ejecutar a un Inquisidor sumido en la herejía». {n}Dirige una mirada clara y confiada a Calcazar.{/n} «Veo... tonos espantosos de sangre reseca que mancilla los colores de su alma».

languages.text: « Vos agissements sont eux aussi discutables, seigneur inquisiteur. Vous avez peut-être le droit de juger et de punir les détenteurs des lettres de marque sacrées, mais ici, dans les régions inexplorées, rien n'empêche un libre-marchand d'exécuter un inquisiteur souillé par l'hérésie, {n}déclare-t-elle en posant un regard confiant sur Calcazar.{/n} La toile de votre âme... est tachée de sordides nuances de sang séché. »
languages.original_text: "Your actions have been questionable too, Lord Inquisitor. You may be within your rights to judge and punish bearers of the sacred Warrant, but here, among the uncharted stars, a Rogue Trader may easily find themselves executing an Inquisitor who is steeped in heresy." {n}Cassia's clear and confident gaze turns to Calcazar.{/n} "I see the canvas of your soul... and it is tainted with the gory hues of dried blood."

traits.locale_text: « Vos agissements sont eux aussi discutables, seigneur inquisiteur. Vous avez peut-être le droit de juger et de punir les détenteurs des lettres de marque sacrées, mais ici, dans les régions inexplorées, rien n'empêche un libre-marchand d'exécuter un inquisiteur souillé par l'hérésie, {n}déclare-t-elle en posant son regard confiant sur Calcazar.{/n} Les couleurs de votre âme... sont entachées par de sordides nuances de sang séché. »

languages.text: 「ロード・インクィジター、あなたの行動にも疑問の余地があります。聖なる令状の保持者を裁き、罰するのはあなたの権限のうちかもしれませんが、この未知の星域では、自由開拓者が異端に染まった異端審問官を簡単に処刑することもできるのですよ」{n}カシアの透き通り、自信に満ちたまなざしがカルカサルに向けられる。{/n}「あたくしにはあなたの魂のキャンバスが見えます…それは身の毛もよだつ渇いた血の色彩で汚れています」
languages.original_text: "Your actions have been questionable too, Lord Inquisitor. You may be within your rights to judge and punish bearers of the sacred Warrant, but here, among the uncharted stars, a Rogue Trader may easily find themselves executing an Inquisitor who is steeped in heresy." {n}Cassia's clear and confident gaze turns to Calcazar.{/n} "I see the canvas of your soul... and it is tainted with the gory hues of dried blood."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・インクィジター、あなたの行動にも疑問の余地があります。聖なる令状の保持者を裁き、罰するのはあなたの権限のうちかもしれませんが、この未知の星域では、自由開拓者が異端に染まった異端審問官を簡単に処刑することもできるのですよ」{n}カシアの透き通り、自信に満ちたまなざしがカルカサルに向けられる。{/n}「あたくしにはあなたの魂のキャンバスが見えます…それは身の毛もよだつ渇いた血の色彩で汚れています」

languages.text: "Eure Taten waren ebenfalls fragwürdig, Großinquisitor. Es mag Euer Recht sein, über die Besitzer der heiligen Handelsbriefe zu urteilen und sie zu bestrafen, doch hier, unter unerforschten Sternen, kann es leicht vorkommen, dass ein Freihändler einen ketzerischen Inquisitor hinrichtet." {n}Cassias klarer, selbstbewusster Blick richtet sich auf Calcazar.{/n} "Ich sehe die Leinwand Eurer Seele ... und sie ist mit den grausamen Tönen getrockneten Bluts besudelt."
languages.original_text: "Your actions have been questionable too, Lord Inquisitor. You may be within your rights to judge and punish bearers of the sacred Warrant, but here, among the uncharted stars, a Rogue Trader may easily find themselves executing an Inquisitor who is steeped in heresy." {n}Cassia's clear and confident gaze turns to Calcazar.{/n} "I see the canvas of your soul... and it is tainted with the gory hues of dried blood."

traits.locale_text: "Eure Taten waren ebenfalls fragwürdig, Großinquisitor. Es mag Euer Recht sein, über die Besitzer der heiligen Handelsbriefe zu urteilen und sie zu bestrafen, doch hier, unter unerforschten Sternen, kann es leicht vorkommen, dass ein Freihändler einen ketzerischen Inquisitor hinrichtet." {n}Ihr klarer und selbstbewusster Blick richtet sich auf Calcazar.{/n} "Ich sehe ... grausame Töne getrockneten Blutes, welche die Farben Eurer Seele beflecken."

languages.text: “你的行为也一直都非常可疑，大审判官。在你自己的领地里，或许你确实有权审判、惩罚神圣授状的持有者，可在这里，行商浪人也同样有权处决深陷异端恶行的审判官。”{n}卡西娅以清澈而自信的目光看着卡尔卡扎。{/n}“我看到了你灵魂的画布……它已经沾满了干涸的血迹。”
languages.original_text: "Your actions have been questionable too, Lord Inquisitor. You may be within your rights to judge and punish bearers of the sacred Warrant, but here, among the uncharted stars, a Rogue Trader may easily find themselves executing an Inquisitor who is steeped in heresy." {n}Cassia's clear and confident gaze turns to Calcazar.{/n} "I see the canvas of your soul... and it is tainted with the gory hues of dried blood."

traits.locale_text: “你的行为也一直都非常可疑，审判长。在你自己的领地里，或许你确实有权审判、惩罚神圣许可证的持有者，可在这里，行商浪人也同样可以处决深陷异端恶行的审判官。”{n}卡西娅以清澈而自信的目光看着卡尔卡扎。{/n}“我看到……干涸的血迹已经玷污了你灵魂的本色。”

languages.text: "Sizin eylemleriniz de şüphe uyandırıcıydı Lord Engizisyoncu. Kutsal Ruhsatname'nin Hamillerini yargılayıp cezalandırmak yetkiniz dâhilinde olabilir fakat burada, keşfedilmemiş yıldızların arasında bir Hür Tacir, kolaylıkla kendini kâfirliğe bulanmış bir Engizisyoncu'yu öldürürken bulabilir." {n}Cassia'nın net ve güvenli bakışları, Calcazar'a dönüyor.{/n} "Ruhunun resmini görüyorum... Kurumuş kan rengiyle lekelenmiş."
languages.original_text: "Your actions have been questionable too, Lord Inquisitor. You may be within your rights to judge and punish bearers of the sacred Warrant, but here, among the uncharted stars, a Rogue Trader may easily find themselves executing an Inquisitor who is steeped in heresy." {n}Cassia's clear and confident gaze turns to Calcazar.{/n} "I see the canvas of your soul... and it is tainted with the gory hues of dried blood."
